title: #26 - That Episode about Sex with Dr. Jess O'Reilly
description:
How do I ask my man to go down on me? Why won’t we have sex anymore? How do we keep it hot and sexy while we’re long distance or just distant because of the pandemic?

This week, we’re tackling your sex and relationship questions with Dr. Jess!

Dr. Jess O'Reilly is a sex and relationship expert with a background in education. Her research and passion involves teacher training in sexual health and she volunteers in schools and universities to help bring better sex and relationship education to students across Ontario. She’s also a television personality, author, podcaster and international speaker who has facilitated hundreds of corporate workshops and retreats in 35 countries.

Connect with Dr. Jess:

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sexwithdrjess/

Podcast on Apple - https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/sex-with-dr-jess/id1166227345

Podcast on Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/0sL5FqZrxCAa94DhntIm5M

Book - https://www.velvetlipssexed.com/shop

Website - https://www.sexwithdrjess.com/

author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
